lead_paragraph: An Education Department official said that although the mayor continued to believe the tests were important, he wanted to hear the parents’ views.

headline.print_headline: Mayor Meets With Group of Parents Opposed to State Tests
headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Meets With Parents Opposed to State Testing

snippet: An Education Department official said that although the mayor continued to believe the tests were important, he wanted to hear the parents’ views.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio meets with principal and group of parents who have criticized state tests and degree to which de Blasio's administration has failed to inform low-income parents of their right to have their children opt-out of tests.
